body:
Comment 1: 
http://golang.org/pkg/path/filepath/#Dir
Dir returns all but the last element of path, typically the path's directory.
... If the path is empty, Dir returns ".".

http://play.golang.org/p/AoYOqSjxzK
In ".." the last element is ".." so "all but the last element" is empty, which is
returned as "."
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
